meanings.definition: Showing great skill or creativity in artistic endeavors.
meanings.sent1: The artsiest painting in the gallery caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent2: She always chooses the artsiest colors for her artwork.
meanings.sent3: The artsiest sculpture in the park seemed to come to life at night.
meanings.sent4: Her dance moves were the artsiest, like a graceful swan on stage.
meanings.sent5: The artsiest music filled the room, making everyone feel inspired.

meanings.definition: Having the highest level of artistic quality or sophistication.
meanings.sent1: The artsiest film of the year won multiple awards.
meanings.sent2: The artsiest jewelry collection sparkled under the lights.
meanings.sent3: The artsiest cake at the party looked almost too beautiful to eat.
meanings.sent4: Her dress was the artsiest creation, turning heads wherever she went.
meanings.sent5: The artsiest garden in town was a peaceful oasis of beauty.
